content.content: @karalabe proposed an interesting compromise on Twitter. Read his Tweet storm for the rationale, and other comments on that thread.  Shower thought: ProgPoW is nice, but it runs the risk of a net split. How about a hybrid PoW? A HF would enable an Ethash/ProgPoW mix (initially 100% Ethash / 0% ProgPoW). Each block could move the ratio by 0.1% in either way. The ratio defines what PoW the next block has.    twitter.com    Péter Szilágyi (peter_szilagyi)  Shower thought: ProgPoW is nice, but it runs the risk of a net split. How about a hybrid PoW?
